name: bonnet hood
notes:
keep cozy (and trending) with this knit bonnet hood! worked flat from tip-to-tip, the hood is shaped with simple knit 2 together decreases and knit front and back increases in squishy garter stitch. a touch of minimal seaming at the back creates a gently contoured fit, while caron colorama halo adds a dreamy, brushed texture for an irresistibly soft finish. the elongated scarf ties let you wrap, drape, or knot in multiple ways—giving you both customizable style and extra warmth all season long.

materials
caron® colorama halo™ (8 oz/227 g; 481 yds/440 m)
hot pink (06001) 1 ball 

size
one size to fit adult.
